entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F2 Rename on class only selects a part of the name #75521
  • Fix `Use auto property` does not update method arguments in property accessors #75516
    Backlog
  • Enable NuGet Audit in roslyn #75510

Closed

  • Implement nullable analysis for `field` keyword #75244
    17.13
  • Obsolete diagnostic not reported on System.Index or System.Range #57745
    Backlog
  • Aggregate telemetry for understanding analyzers/fixer perf to report on slow analyzers #67074
    17.6 P3
  • await completion adds async to unrelated local function instead of the containing method declaration #67952
    17.8 P4
  • List of Workspace/OOP/infrastructure simplifications we may be able to make within the Workspace #56763
    Backlog
  • `new str$$` completion shows two lowercase `string`, one as keyword and one as class name #63614
    Backlog
  • Source Generator - Visual representation of generated .g.cs files in Solution Explorer never updates #64162
    Backlog
  • Sticky scroll doesn't work in C# when Block Structure Guides are disabled #68310
    18.0
  • Intellisense not suggesting extension methods from source generated code #69887
  • Cross-project errors using reference assemblies #13815
    Backlog
  • API proposal: Expose functionality of `SyntaxGenerator.TypedConstantExpression` via a better method #62181
    Backlog
  • CodeFix/CodeRefactoring Support for AdditionalFiles and AnalyzerConfigFiles #62877
    Backlog
  • IDE0038 is not enforced during build #69052
    17.8 P4
  • Provide a knob for overridden members to keep showing in the editor's `override` menu. #69713
    Backlog
  • `dotnet_style_prefer_is_null_check_over_reference_equality_method` not respected by other features #65577
    18.0
  • Language Injection : Syntax highlighting and Intellisense support for languages or formats contained in string. #67182
    Backlog
  • IDE0055 should be better actionable #67594
    Backlog
  • Visual Basic Documentation Comments should minimize beside target, not above it. #67401
    Backlog
  • Revise `DeclarationModifiers.From` implementation #66171
  • 'Use primary constructor' should not be shown above 'Initialize field' #68671
    18.0
  • LanguageVersionExtensions needs to map special values to specific versions before comparing values #69477
  • Remove from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Features the deprecated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Elfie #67256
    18.0
  • FAR doesn't list all references from file linked into multiple project #66558
    18.0
  • How to extend embedded language highlighting utilizing StringSyntaxAttribute? #68435
    Backlog
  • C# document outline add region #65333
    Backlog
  • the rename variable utility renames more variable then needed #68464
    17.8 P4
  • Expose project ID on compilations in ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe #67218
    Backlog
  • Completions should not show `Obsolete` items with `error` set to `true` #67089
    17.8 P4
  • Embedded languages - support customizing tooltip #65531
    Backlog
  • Provide access to ApplicationDefinition project item from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project #67215
    Backlog
  • Pasting text in snipped closes the edit mode immediately #67572
    17.8 P4
  • Semantic code snippet can not loop Tab #67738
    17.8 P4
  • Incorrect Indentation after inserting prop or ctor semantic snippets (maybe others...) #67740
    17.8 P4
  • ctor code snippset doesn't work after 17.4.0 preview 5.0 update #68514
    17.8 P4
  • For loop auto completion, why not make settings to customize it's behavior? #60891
    18.0
  • Template formatting with namespace style leads to mis-aligned content #65591
    17.8
  • Introducing inefficiency: It seems the Add Reference dialog box pops up from the Roslyn "red light bulb" ... seems superfluous for all occasions. #65778
    Backlog
  • MissingMethodException in VS 17.6 RoslynCodeAnalysisService process when source generator loads another assembly #68290
    17.8 P4
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator stops working after file rename #67125
    17.8 P4
  • Visual Studio IDE tool tips for method parameters do not display all parameters when there is a very large number as it overflows tool tip text limit. #75486
    Backlog
  • DebuggerDisplayAttribute #26054
    Backlog
  • Text editor project selection always resets in shared source files #41874
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify the compiler's policy towards well-known types/members #75522
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Fix keyword recommending in record parameter attributes #75520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix 'use auto property' when field is passed as method argument #75519
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12] EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated (#75423) #75518
    Area-Interactive, Blocked, untriaged
  • Also compare other properties when remove block spans #75515
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12] Field-backed properties: [field:] should not be considered a backing field reference (#75461) #75513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove extra invalid character #75523
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Create nuspec for servicehub r2r symbol packages #75514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'await completion' adding async to the wrong member #75517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unused option #75494
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated #75423
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Mention `Enumerable.Reverse` breaking change #75501
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, Next
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #75504
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not crash server if we fail to determine language for non-mutating request #75509
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report obsolete diagnostics on `System.Index` and `System.Range` #75473
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75442
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [WIP] Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust IDE0290 code fix to keep comments before removed syntax node (#69012) #69518
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unify collection expression cycle handling #75464
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move `#if NET` directives forward #75500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add more first-class Span tests #75414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Run binary SDL once on all artifacts #75502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
